Instantly teleport the party inside the destination, near the Major Gate.
The percentage of successful weapon or magical attack rolls
The number of critical hits achieved by this character on attack rolls (weapon & magic)
The number of critical failures suffered by this character on attack rolls (weapon & magic)
The total number of damage points inflicted by characters
The number of enemies for which this character delivered the final blow
The total number of hit points lost by this character
The total number of hit points restored by this character
The total number of spell slots and power charges used by the character
The number of cells that the character has entered, in all 3 dimensions. It represents the "mileage" of the character
The number of times the character has fallen unconscious or died
The number of experience points gained by the character
The total time (including rests) that the party has spent in the game
The number of short rests completed by the party
The number of long rests completed by the party
